import {Link, useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card, ListGroupItem} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' // import products from '../products' import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' function ProductScreen() { const {id} = useParams() const [product, setProduct] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { async function fetchProduct() { const { data } = await axios.get(`/products/${id}/`) setProduct(data) } fetchProduct() }, [id]) // const product = products.find((p) => p._id === id) return (
Go Back

{product.name}

 {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Price: ${product.price} Availability {product.countInStock > 0 ? "In Stock" : "Out of Stock"}
) } export default ProductScreen
